scenario_text.value: Takumaaa! Here, this is for you!
Oh, thanks a lot. Where’d you pick this up?

Some enemies came through before. One of them
dropped it.
Wait, what?! Are you okay?

I’m great! Shakomon cleaned their clocks
good!
Oh yeah? Good to hear.

Oh! But don’t tell Kaito that part. I don’t
even wanna think about what he’d say.
You got it. Still, you two...
Huh?
What?

Is it just me, or are you guys on a better
wavelength than ever?
Oh yeah! We leveled up our buddy rank again!
Yep!

I hope Falcomon and Minoru can meet each
other halfway soon.

He wouldn’t have to worry if they talked and
became buddies. All good, right?
That’s a simple way to put it.
Still, I get what you’re trying to say.

I can say I trust Agumon, and that connection
helps keep me calm.

Wanna follow my Buddyism religion? Can’t
promise divine protection, but it’s fun!

When the heck did you have time to found
a religion...?

Falcomon should talk to Minoru a bunch and
buddy up with him, already!

This is just my instincts talking. Or maybe
it’s better to say it’s what I want for them.
